SELECT WO.ORDER_ID AS orderId , CM1.CODE_NAME AS STAGE , WU.NAME AS orderName , WO.TEAM , CM3.CODE_NAME AS RS , WO.HANDICAP , WO.ODDS , WO.AMOUNT , CM2.CODE_NAME AS STATUS , WO.RESULT , TO_CHAR(WO.ORDER_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi') AS orderTime , TO_CHAR(WO.CONFIRM_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi') AS confirmTime FROM WC_ORDER WO LEFT JOIN WC_USER WU ON (WU.ID=WO.NAME) LEFT JOIN CODE_MST CM1 ON (CM1.GROUP_ID='001' AND CM1.CODE_ID=WO.CODE_ID) LEFT JOIN CODE_MST CM2 ON (CM2.GROUP_ID='002' AND CM2.CODE_ID=WO.STATUS) LEFT JOIN CODE_MST CM3 ON (CM3.GROUP_ID='003' AND CM3.CODE_ID=WO.RS) 1=1
AND WO.NAME = '${orderName}'
AND WO.STATUS='${orderStatus}'
AND WO.CODE_ID='${stageId}'
ORDER BY WO.ORDER_ID
